name: The Avoider (OsmineeNitro)
description:
You're The Ship, and you need to avoid asteroids. But be careful! If you crash on asteroid, you will need to start over!

Made for TweetTweet Jam 4.

Controls

Left/Right arrow - move

Game

You need to avoid asteroids and score points. Every 10 seconds asteroids will grow, so you need to be careful. If you crash on it, game starts over. Gme also has highscore system, which is not erased when game is restarted.

Share your best score in comments below!
